main.cpp File Reference

Entry point template for application. Creates windows using SDL, then initializes scene, sets render loop and receives mouse and keyboard events from user. This template shows very basic usage of framework. More...

Detailed Description

Entry point template for application. Creates windows using SDL, then initializes scene, sets render loop and receives mouse and keyboard events from user. This template shows very basic usage of framework.
